title: Another URF discussion
body:
Dear Riot,

I have like most, thoroughly enjoyed URF this year especially as we have had it twice already and will probably get it another few times before the year is finished.

One thing I miss though is the hype and promotion of URF you guys did the past 2 years. For example, when you first introduced URF it was advertised as 'The future of League'. Last year you released a song with it.

A suggestion that would keep the hype for URF and the rotating game mode queue is that the RGM doesn't start until April 1st of the new year with the first mode being URF of course. I get that it might get tricky to find new ways to promote it but I am sure with your workforce and a year of ideas you'll be able to come up with something great. It could also be a way to reintroduce the RGM to the new year.

Regards

Very Funny
